Package org.radixware.jiraclient.exception

JIRA specific exceptions.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JiraClientException
    Common JIRA Remote Client exception in case of problems (connectivity, malformed messages, etc).
    JiraObjectNotFoundException
    Special exception that notifies client JIRA object not found (for ex.: user, project, issue, issue type and etc).
    MissingSSLContextException
    Notifies when SSL context is not set.
